channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: The Twelve Days of Blog-mas: No.1 - A Creative Use for Intune Remediations
item.description:
Happy Holidays folks!
I had a wild-hair idea to write one short blog post, per day, for 12 days along the theme of the “Twelve Days of Christmas” song. I made the mistake of mentioning the idea to one Arnab Mitra - yes, THAT Arnab Mitra. Don't let the smile fool you - he twisted my arm to follow through on the idea, soooo here you go.
You won’t find seven swans a-swimming, nor ten lords a-leaping, but here’s one drummer-drumming (queue Neil Peart).
P.S. I created a temporary user, a temporary PC and other temporary elements to use for making this content. I've since deleted them...
